entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 39.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 39. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then periods of light snow. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 18.
